byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Brit Information Ministry denies rumors of German troop and parachutist landings in West Midlands
snippet: BERLIN, July 1--Invading German troops yesterday set foot upon English soil for the first time. A special report issued tonight declared that the British island of Guernsey, in the Channel off the French coast, had been "occupied ......

headline.main: NAZI FORCES TAKE THE CHANNEL ISLES; BRITISH CHANNEL ISLANDS SEIZED BY GERMAN FORCES

lead_paragraph: BERLIN, July 1--Invading German troops yesterday set foot upon English soil for the first time. A special report issued tonight declared that the British island of Guernsey, in the Channel off the French coast, had been "occupied ...
